name: e-Commerce-Pros
short_description: We develop and maintain plugins for e-commerce platforms. At this point of time development is focused on Zen-Cart, however we will port to other platforms such as OS Commerce is due course. Our flagship plugin is ecp_Content, which is a content management, news and blog platform that also allows you to manage member only content pages for Zen-Cart. In addition to this we have developed an additional plugin to integrate ecp_Content and Zen-Cart with the PayPal subscription feature. For more information visit our website.
summary: e-Commerce Tools for Pros such as a Blog Plugin for Zen-Cart
